title: EXT_geopose glTF extension
description: glTF extension for specifying the position and orientation of models on the Earth.

longitude.description: Longitude in the WGS84 datum. The angle must be specified in degrees.

latitude.description: Latitude in the WGS84 datum. The angle must be specified in degrees.

height.description: Heights are in meters above (or below) the WGS84 ellipsoid.

ypr.description: Rotation-only transformation from a WGS-84-referenced local tangent plane east-north-up coordinate system.

yaw.description: Rotation about the LTP-ENU frame Z (up) axis. The angle must be specified in degrees.

pitch.description: Pitch is rotation about the y axis of the yaw-rotated local frame. The angle must be specified in degrees.

roll.description: Roll is rotation about the yaw and pitch rotated x axis of the local frame. The angle must be specified in degrees.
